Tolex Lighters - Orange

Merch Info

Bring the doom metal vibe to the next smokeout with our custom orange Tolex wrapped lighters.


With a soft, yet rugged rubberized grip, and its strikingly iconic color, you'll be sure to raise the eyebrows of your fellow doom-heads.


Sales from this product will go directly towards: an improved workbench, and the next line of Tolex lighters.
